JasperTemplate.name: ProfileConstraintReport
JasperTemplate.DesignXml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <!-- Created with iReport - A designer for JasperReports --> <!DOCTYPE jasperReport PUBLIC "//JasperReports//DTD Report Design//EN" "http://jasperreports.sourceforge.net/dtds/jasperreport.dtd">

<jasperReport name="ProfileConstraintReport" columnCount="1" printOrder="Vertical" orientation="Portrait" pageWidth="595" pageHeight="842" columnWidth="535" columnSpacing="0" leftMargin="30" rightMargin="30" topMargin="0" bottomMargin="0" whenNoDataType="NoPages" isTitleNewPage="false" isSummaryNewPage="false"> <property name="ireport.scriptlethandling" value="0" /> <property name="ireport.encoding" value="UTF-8" /> <import value="java.util.*" /> <import value="net.sf.jasperreports.engine.*" /> <import value="net.sf.jasperreports.engine.data.*" />
<style name="title" isDefault="false" fontName="Arial" fontSize="24" isBold="true" isBlankWhenNull="true" /> <style name="bandedText" isDefault="false" mode="Opaque" forecolor="#000000" backcolor="#FFFFFF" topBorder="None" topBorderColor="#FFFFFF" bottomBorder="1Point" bottomBorderColor="#CCCCCC" fontName="Arial" fontSize="12" isBlankWhenNull="true" >
<conditionalStyle> <conditionExpression><![CDATA[new Boolean($V{REPORT_COUNT}.intValue() % 2 == 0)]]></conditionExpression> <style isDefault="false" backcolor="#EEEEEE" /> </conditionalStyle> </style> <style name="spBlue" isDefault="false" mode="Opaque" forecolor="#FFFFFF" backcolor="#1A7182" isStyledText="false" fontName="Arial" fontSize="12" isBold="true"
isBlankWhenNull="true" /> <style name="spLightBlue" isDefault="false" mode="Opaque" forecolor="#333333" backcolor="#c2dce0" isStyledText="false" fontName="Arial" fontSize="12" isBold="true"
isBlankWhenNull="true" /> <style name="spGreen" isDefault="false" mode="Opaque" forecolor="#FFFFFF" backcolor="#5A8429" isStyledText="false" fontName="Arial" fontSize="12" isBold="true"
isBlankWhenNull="true" /> <style name="spLightGreen" isDefault="false" mode="Opaque" forecolor="#333333" backcolor="#cfdcbf" isStyledText="false" fontName="Arial" fontSize="12" isBold="true"
isBlankWhenNull="true" /> <style name="spOrange" isDefault="false" mode="Opaque" forecolor="#FFFFFF" backcolor="#F45D14" isStyledText="false" fontName="Arial" fontSize="12" isBold="true"
isBlankWhenNull="true" /> <style name="spLightOrange" isDefault="false" mode="Opaque" forecolor="#333333" backcolor="#f4c3ab" isStyledText="false" fontName="Arial" fontSize="12" isBold="true"
isBlankWhenNull="true" /> <style name="spYellow" isDefault="false" mode="Opaque" forecolor="#333333" backcolor="#F3B833" isStyledText="false" fontName="Arial" fontSize="12" isBold="true"
isBlankWhenNull="true" /> <style name="spLightYellow" isDefault="false" mode="Opaque" forecolor="#333333" backcolor="#f3ddaa" isStyledText="false" fontName="Arial" fontSize="12" isBold="true"
isBlankWhenNull="true" /> <style name="spRed" isDefault="false" mode="Opaque" forecolor="#FFFFFF" backcolor="#b40b0e" isStyledText="false" fontName="Arial" fontSize="12" isBold="true"
isBlankWhenNull="true" /> <style name="body" isDefault="false" mode="Transparent" forecolor="#000000" backcolor="#FFFFFF" isStyledText="false" fontName="Arial" fontSize="12"
isBlankWhenNull="true" /> <style name="bodySmall" isDefault="false" mode="Transparent" forecolor="#000000" backcolor="#FFFFFF" isStyledText="false" fontName="Arial" fontSize="10"
isBlankWhenNull="true" /> <style name="bodyGray" isDefault="false" mode="Opaque" forecolor="#000000" backcolor="#DDDDDD" isStyledText="false" fontName="Arial" fontSize="12"
isBlankWhenNull="true" /> <style name="footer" isDefault="false" forecolor="#000000" fontName="Arial" fontSize="10" />
<parameter name="id" isForPrompting="true" class="java.lang.String"> <defaultValueExpression ><![CDATA["40289ee40df25417010df2542abc0004"]]></defaultValueExpression> </parameter> <queryString><![CDATA[select * from spt_profile_constraints pc where pc.profile = $P{id} order by elt]]></queryString>
<field name="profile" class="java.lang.String"/> <field name="elt" class="java.lang.String"/> <field name="idx" class="java.lang.Integer"/>
<background> <band height="0" isSplitAllowed="true" > </band> </background> <title> <band height="0" isSplitAllowed="true" > </band> </title> <pageHeader> <band height="0" isSplitAllowed="true" > </band> </pageHeader> <columnHeader> <band height="17" isSplitAllowed="true" > <textField isStretchWithOverflow="false" isBlankWhenNull="true" evaluationTime="Now" hyperlinkType="None" hyperlinkTarget="Self" > <reportElement style="spLightGreen" x="0" y="0" width="500" height="17" key="textField-1"/> <box topBorder="None" topBorderColor="#000000" leftBorder="None" leftBorderColor="#000000" leftPadding="5" rightBorder="None" rightBorderColor="#000000" bottomBorder="None" bottomBorderColor="#000000"/> <textElement textAlignment="Left" verticalAlignment="Middle"> <font/> </textElement> <textFieldExpression class="java.lang.String"><![CDATA[$R{rept_profile_constraint_col_rules}]]></textFieldExpression> </textField> </band> </columnHeader> <detail> <band height="25" isSplitAllowed="true" > <textField isStretchWithOverflow="true" isBlankWhenNull="true" evaluationTime="Now" hyperlinkType="None" hyperlinkTarget="Self" > <reportElement style="bodySmall" x="10" y="3" width="490" height="20" key="textField"/> <box topBorder="None" topBorderColor="#000000" leftBorder="None" leftBorderColor="#000000" rightBorder="None" rightBorderColor="#000000" bottomBorder="None" bottomBorderColor="#000000"/> <textElement verticalAlignment="Middle"> <font/> </textElement> <textFieldExpression class="java.lang.String"><![CDATA[$F{elt}]]></textFieldExpression> </textField> </band> </detail> <columnFooter> <band height="0" isSplitAllowed="true" > </band> </columnFooter> <pageFooter> <band height="0" isSplitAllowed="true" > </band> </pageFooter> <summary> <band height="0" isSplitAllowed="true" > </band> </summary> </jasperReport>
